name: How to Hang a Heavy Bag?
name_original: How to Hang a Heavy Bag?
description:
PS: I am form Russia, sorry for my grammatical mistakes

This game is created for Random WikiHow Jam #3

Game about heavy bag. You should jump to hook for hang. Its mini puzzle and interesting platformer with strange movement mechanics. 12 levels. Will you be able to pass them all?
I think it was fun

Version 1( I want to improve it )

It is made for this article: https://www.wikihow.com/Hang-a-Heavy-Bag
My Inst: https://www.instagram.com/crug.airus.gamedev/
